accept(bytes32,bytes32).details: Lender accepts loan repayment and principal + interest are sent back to the Lender / Loan Fund

params.secret: Secret B1 revealed by the Lender

approved(bytes32).return: Bool that indicates whether loan has been approved

borrowerLoanCount(address).return: Number of loans originated by Borrower

cancel(bytes32).details: Lender cancels loan and principal is sent back to the Lender / Loan Fund

cancel(bytes32,bytes32).details: Lender cancels loan and principal is sent back to the Lender / Loan Fund

params.secret: Secret B1 revealed by the Lender

collateral(bytes32).return: Amount of collateral backing the loan (in sats)

collateralValue(bytes32).details: Gets the price in USD from the Medianizer and multiplies it by the collateral in sats to get the USD value of collateral

params.decimals_: The number of decimals in the stablecoin token
params.funds_: The address of the Funds contract
params.med_: The address of the Medianizer contract

params.loanExpiration_: The timestamp for the end of the loan
params.usrs_: Array of three addresses containing the borrower, lender, and optional arbiter address
params.vals_: Array of seven uints containing loan principal, interest, liquidation penalty, optional arbiter fee, collateral amount, liquidation ratio, and request timestamp

ddiv(uint256).return: x converted to 10 ** decimals if decimals are less than 18, else x

discountCollateralValue(bytes32).return: Value of the discounted collateral required to Liquidate a Loan (USD in WAD)

dmul(uint256).return: x converted to WAD (10 ** 18) if decimals are less than 18, else x

fee(bytes32).return: Amount of Fee in stablecoin tokens

funded(bytes32).return: Bool that indicates whether loan has been funded

interest(bytes32).return: Amount of Interest in stablecoin tokens

lenderLoanCount(address).return: Number of loans originated by Lender

params.pubKeyHash: The Bitcoin Public Key Hash of the liquidator
params.secretHash: The Secret Hash D1 provided by the liquidator

liquidate(bytes32,bytes32,bytes20).return: sale_ The Id of the Sale (Liquidation)

liquidationRatio(bytes32).return: Liquidation Ratio in RAY (i.e. 140% would be 1.4 * (10 ** 27))

minCollateralValue(bytes32).details: Gets the amount in the Loan that still needs to be repaid, converts to WAD, and multiplies it by the minimum liquidation ratio
minCollateralValue(bytes32).return: Value of the minimum collateral required (USD in WAD)

minSeizableCollateral(bytes32).return: Amount of seizable collateral value (in sats) required to cover a Loan

off(bytes32).return: Bool that indicates whether loan has been terminated

owedForLiquidation(bytes32).details: owedForLiquidation includes penalty which is paid out to oracles to give incentive for users to continue updating them
owedForLiquidation(bytes32).return: Amount needed to cover a liquidation

owedForLoan(bytes32).return: Amount needed to repay the Loan

paid(bytes32).return: Bool that indicates whether loan has been repaid

penalty(bytes32).details: Upon liquidation penalty is paid out to oracles to give incentive for users to continue updating them
penalty(bytes32).return: Amount of Penalty in stablecoin tokens

principal(bytes32).return: Amount of Principal in stablecoin tokens

refund(bytes32).details: Send tokens back to the Borrower, and close Loan

params.loan: The Id of the Loan     *        Note: If Lender does not accept repayment, liquidation cannot occur

refundableCollateral(bytes32).return: Amount of refundable collateral backing the loan (in sats)

repaid(bytes32).return: Amount of the loan that has been repaid

params.amount: The amount of tokens to repay     *        Note: Anyone can repay the loan

safe(bytes32).return: Bool that indicates whether loan is safe from liquidation

sale(bytes32).return: Bool that indicates whether loan has been liquidated

seizableCollateral(bytes32).return: Amount of seizable collateral backing the loan (in sats)

temporaryRefundableCollateral(bytes32).details: Represents the amount of refundable collateral that has been locked and only has 1 conf, where 6 confs hasn't been received yet
temporaryRefundableCollateral(bytes32).return: Amount of temporary refundable collateral backing the loan (in sats)

temporarySeizableCollateral(bytes32).details: Represents the amount of seizable collateral that has been locked and only has 1 conf, where 6 confs hasn't been received yet
temporarySeizableCollateral(bytes32).return: Amount of temporary seizable collateral backing the loan (in sats)

params.secretA1: Secret A1 provided by the borrower

withdrawn(bytes32).return: Bool that indicates whether loan has been withdrawn

acceptExpiration(bytes32).notice: Get the Accept Expiration of a Loan

approve(bytes32).notice: Lender approves locking of Bitcoin collateral

approveExpiration(bytes32).notice: Get the Approve Expiration of a Loan

approved(bytes32).notice: Get the approved status of a Loan

arbiter(bytes32).notice: Get the Arbiter of a Loan

borrower(bytes32).notice: Get the Borrower of a Loan

borrowerLoanCount(address).notice: Get the number of loans originated by a Borrower

cancel(bytes32).notice: Lender cancels loan after Seizure Expiration in case Lender loses secret

cancel(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Lender cancels loan after Borrower locks collateral

collateral(bytes32).notice: Get the Collateral of a Loan

collateralValue(bytes32).notice: The current collateral value of a Loan

ddiv(uint256).notice: Decimal division that divides the number to 10 ** decimals from 10 ** 18 if stablecoin token decimals are less than 18

discountCollateralValue(bytes32).notice: The discount collateral value in which a Liquidator can purchase the collateral for

dmul(uint256).notice: Decimal multiplication that multiplies the number to 10 ** 18 if stablecoin token decimals are less than 18

fee(bytes32).notice: Get the Fee of a Loan

fund(bytes32).notice: Lender sends tokens to the loan agreement

funded(bytes32).notice: Get the funded status of a Loan

interest(bytes32).notice: Get the Interest of a Loan

lender(bytes32).notice: Get the Lender of a Loan

lenderLoanCount(address).notice: Get the number of loans originated by a Lender

liquidate(bytes32,bytes32,bytes20).notice: Any third party starts liquidation of the Bitcoin collateral by providing tokens with the intention to buy at a discount

liquidationExpiration(bytes32).notice: Get the Liquidation Expiration of a Loan

liquidationRatio(bytes32).notice: Get Liquidation Ratio of a Loan (Minimum Collateralization Ratio)

minCollateralValue(bytes32).notice: The minimum collateral value to cover the amount owed for a Loan

minSeizableCollateral(bytes32).notice: The minimum seizable collateral required to cover a Loan

off(bytes32).notice: Get the off status of a Loan

owedForLiquidation(bytes32).notice: Get the amount that needs to be covered in the case of a liquidation for a Loan

owedForLoan(bytes32).notice: Get the amount needed to repay a Loan

owedToLender(bytes32).notice: Get the amount owed to the Lender for a Loan

owing(bytes32).notice: Get the amount still owing for a Loan

paid(bytes32).notice: Get the paid status of a Loan

penalty(bytes32).notice: Get the Penalty of a Loan (if not repaid)

principal(bytes32).notice: Get the Principal of a Loan

refund(bytes32).notice: Borrower refunds tokens in the case that Lender doesn't accept loan repayment

refundableCollateral(bytes32).notice: Get the Refundable Collateral of a Loan

repaid(bytes32).notice: Get the amount repaid towards a Loan

repay(bytes32,uint256).notice: Lender sends tokens to the loan agreement

safe(bytes32).notice: Get the safe status of a Loan

sale(bytes32).notice: Get the sale status of a Loan

seizableCollateral(bytes32).notice: Get the Seizable Collateral of a Loan

seizureExpiration(bytes32).notice: Get the Seizure Expiration of a Loan

setSecretHashes(bytes32,bytes32[4],bytes.notice: Set Secret Hashes for loan agreement

temporaryRefundableCollateral(bytes32).notice: Get the Temporary Refundable Collateral of a Loan

temporarySeizableCollateral(bytes32).notice: Get the Temporary Seizable Collateral of a Loan

withdrawn(bytes32).notice: Get the withdrawn status of a Loan
